template.p: Welcome to the Odoo Catering package.

This module helps you manage every step of the process, from initial customer relationships to event planning and execution. With it, you can effortlessly prepare and validate events, purchase the necessary raw materials, and efficiently track your entire operation.
Boost your team's efficiency and improve customer satisfaction across all your catering services with this powerful tool.
You can access every installed App in your Odoo database on your main dashboard.

li.p: The CRM & Sales Apps: Manage all your client contacts and quotations.

ul.li: The Project & planning Apps: Manage event-related tasks and track their progress through customizable stages.
The Purchase App: Accurately track all purchased and rented products.
The Invoice App: Keep a clear record of all your invoices.

li.p: The Website App: Use this app as a virtual showroom and a powerful tool for generating new leads.

template.p: The "1 Day Wedding" service product is configured to trigger automatic project creation. When the sales order is confirmed, a new project is instantly generated from the "1 Day B2C Project" template (thanks to the product settings).
To ensure correct date calculation across all tasks, the Sales Order delivery date is automatically set to match the last date of the generated project.
Furthermore, specific services listed on the quotation, such as "Custom Menu Design," are set to "Create Task," which adds a corresponding task with the same name to the new project.

Once the Sales Order is confirmed, the project is automatically created. The project's top bar then becomes your central hub, giving you quick access to essential management tools like invoices, purchase orders, time tracking, planning, and other resources.
The dashboard also provides an immediate view of your project's profitability.

For large catering events, different types of logistics are required to get all the products and materials where they need to go. By registering these movements in Odoo, you can ensure every item is accounted for. Here's how to manage each type of purchase and delivery.
Use this process for items that need to be delivered to your workshop for food preparation or storage.

li.p: Create a Purchase Order directly from the project.
Add all necessary products (we recommend using goods without tracking to avoid complexity).
Validate the purchase order.

template.p: Once validated, a receipt will be automatically generated at your workshop, ready for the delivery.
For items like beverages or rented materials that are delivered directly to the event, use a dropship operation. Before you begin, be sure the event location is registered in your contacts.

li.p: Create a Purchase Order directly from the project.
Add the necessary products.
Select Dropship Delivery and choose the correct event location.
Validate the purchase order.

template.p: This will generate a dropship operation that goes directly to the event location.
Use this process for food and materials that have been prepared at your workshop and need to be delivered to the event venue.

li.p: From the project's top bar, click "From WH" to create a new delivery.
Select the destination location (the event venue).
Add the products to be delivered.
Mark the delivery as "To Do."

template.p: By following these steps, all of your receipts and deliveries will be registered in Odoo, creating a clear checklist and reminders for every necessary stock operation linked to the event.
